name: Peasant Perry's Peculiar Predicament
description:
***Summary***

Play as Perry, a simple peasant who spends his days toiling in the fields and dreaming of a live beyond the borders of his village. Longing for adventure to see the world beyond the familiar town, Perry has decided today is the today to take a step forward into the unknown; his first adventure!

***Details***

Peasant Perry's Peculiar Predicament is a 3rd-Person Adventure Platformer with dry-comedic conversations, sometimes some puzzles, and casual fun.

***Future of the Project***

P4 is currently a functional prototype of the very first level in Perry's adventure. I created this project for something lighthearted and fun but if enough interest is shown, I'd be more than happy to move up the development pipeline to the forefront.
